body:
ZFP is primarily build via CMake, which will have all install logic and configuration files generated.
The 0.5.0 release did not support this yet, so we toss it.

Fix #12998

cc @markcmiller86 @michaelkuhn 

## Install Tests

- [x] ZFP 0.5.1-0.5.5
- [x] ADIOS 1.13.1 https://github.com/ornladios/ADIOS/issues/203
- [x] ADIOS2 2.4.0 & 2.5.0
- [x] h5z-zfp 0.8.0 (^hdf5@1.10.5)
- [x] ecp-viz-sdk 1.0 (+zfp)
- [x] savanna https://github.com/ornladios/ADIOS/issues/203 #13001
- [x] macsio 1.1 (+zfp)
title: ZFP: CMake Package
